definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge

sentences.english: Connect the battery and ammeter to the starter as shown in the illustration.
sentences.chinese: 按说明连接电池和安培计到起动机上。

sentences.english: The guard terminal of the electrometer ammeter or picoammeter is the LO input terminal.
sentences.chinese: 静电计安培计和皮安计的保护端为LO输入端。

sentences.english: Find also the equivalent resistance of the adapted meter.
sentences.chinese: 求改装后的安培计的电阻。

sentences.english: The ideal ammeter should read zero when its input terminals are left open.
sentences.chinese: 当输入端开路时，理想安培计的读数应当为零。

sentences.english: All the LEDs are connected in parallel with a 100-ohm resistor in series with each.
sentences.chinese: 在此方法中，恒压源与未知电阻和安培计相串联。

sentences.english: He only had some ammeter and an ampoule.
sentences.chinese: 他只有一些安培计和一个安瓶。

sentences.english: Check that the ammeter indicates the specified current.
An ammeter is a measuring instrument used to measure the electric current in a circuit.
sentences.chinese: 电流表又称安培计，是测量电流的仪表。

sentences.english: In this method, a constant voltage source is placed in series with the unknown resistor and an ammeter.
sentences.chinese: 在此方法中，恒压源与未知电阻和安培计相串联。

definition: eigenvector (math.)/also written 特徵向量|特征向量
(elec.) unidirectional current/DC/also written 直流[zhi2 liu2]
